introduction: An employee has a wife, a daughter, a small apartment, a small car and a hamster who is everybody's pet. He lives a normal life. Howeve r, one day, due to a stain on his coat, everything is thrown out of gear and becomes surrealistic.Film is a metaphor on human wish to run away from everyday's banal problems.Josko Marusic's comical muse about a cat who takes over a man's household.1988 Gold Medal for Best Animated Film, Belgrade1988 Gold Medal for Direction, Belgrade1989 Jury Award for Most Amusing Film, Varna
